metadata.title: CVE-2020-25427 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A Null pointer dereference vulnerability exits in MP4Box - GPAC version0.8.0-rev177-g51a8ef874-master via the gf_isom_get_track_id function, whichcauses a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
